#   These geographical databases allow you to restrict which countries can gain access to
#   your server. They are fully compatible with applications such as ConfigServer Firewall,
#   Wireshark, Elastic Search, NGINX, Snowplow Analytics, Revive Adserver, OPNSense, etc.
#   A more detailed list is available at:
#       - https://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/docs/databases/#client-apis
